EmailTemplate.name: Report Export Template(to be shared with user))
EmailTemplate.subject: Report Export Permisison
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
To receive access to export data from Salesforce.
Please provide the approval from your MD/ED and let us know the "Business reason" for the export permission.
Please complete the Salesforce GDPR training in workday to get the access to the export report permission set in the salesforce.
Workday Training Link.
Feel free to reach out to us in case of any doubts.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName}, Salesforce Configuration Team
